sentence.Network_en: Your time could be usefully employed in attending to professional matters.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以有效地利用时间处理一些专业问题。

sentence.Network_en: We need to find ways of dealing creatively and usefully with our feelings.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们需要找到一些既有创意又实用的方法来调整我们的情绪。

sentence.Network_en: In some cases the slag can be disposed of usefully.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... similarly 相似地 usefully 有用地 recently 最近.

list.abs: hammer untiringly 不知疲倦地锤打hammer usefully 有效地锤打hammer voluntarily 有意地锤打
Extra money could be usefully spent on this project ., 多余的钱可以有效地用在这个项目上.

it would be expected for the dissertation that would provide the usefully theoretically contribution on the reformation of the bio-diversity protection policies in our country .希望本文能对我国生物多样性保护政策的改革提供有用的理论贡献！
Is there anything I can usefully do here ?, 这里有没有我能帮忙做的事情?

entry.tran: 有用的；可用的；有助益的
entry.def: If something is useful, you can use it to do something or to help you in some way.

example.ex: The slow cooker is very useful for people who go out all day...
example.tran: 慢炖锅对于整天都不在家的人来说很有用。

example.ex: Hypnotherapy can be useful in helping you give up smoking...
example.tran: 催眠疗法可能有助于你戒烟。

entry.def: If an object or skill comes in useful, it can help you achieve something in a particular situation.

example.ex: The accommodation is some distance from the clubhouse, so a hire car comes in useful.
example.tran: 住处离会所有一段距离，所以租一辆车会很有用。

sentences.sentence: "extra money could be usefully spent on this project"
